plugins.name: article-writer
plugins.description: Create high-quality technical articles with full research, documentation, and quality checks

plugins.name: code
plugins.description: Code quality and production readiness toolkit with cleanup, analysis, testing (Pest + Playwright), and deployment preparation

plugins.name: docs-specialist
plugins.description: Specialized documentation writer and reviewer with commands for updating and validating project documentation

plugins.name: docker-specialist
plugins.description: Specialized Docker and Docker Compose assistant with comprehensive documentation for container management, networking, databases, SSL, and troubleshooting

plugins.name: filament-specialist
plugins.description: Ultra-specialized plugin for FilamentPHP v4 development - generates resources, forms, tables, actions, widgets, infolists, and tests following official documentation patterns

plugins.name: laravel-filament-package
plugins.description: Complete toolkit for creating, developing, and testing Laravel packages and Filament plugins. Uses latest versions of Laravel, Pest, and Filament for testing.

plugins.name: taskmanager
plugins.description: Hierarchical task management system with project memory for planning, executing, and tracking tasks from PRDs

plugins.name: terminal-specialist
plugins.description: Specialized terminal and shell systems expert with comprehensive documentation on TTY/PTY architecture, streams, signals, escape sequences, job control, and cross-platform CLI development

plugins.name: test-specialist
plugins.description: Automated test generation and execution for PHP, Laravel, Livewire, and Filament using Pest 4
